mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.gmt_create gmtCreate, m.gmt_modified gmtmodified, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM power_account_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN power_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN power_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN power_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.account_id = #{id} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.gmt_create gmtCreate, m.gmt_modified gmtmodified, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM power_role_menu_relation rmr LEFT JOIN power_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT r.id id, r.gmt_create gmtCreate, r.gmt_modified gmtmodified, r.`name` `name`, r.url url, r.description description, r.category_id categoryId FROM power_role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN power_resource r ON rrr.resource_id = r.id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.id
